Title: The Alliance
Plot: Michael arranges a morale-boosting birthday party for Meredith and is determined to come up with the funniest message in her card. Dwight wants a pact with Jim to fight the downsizing, and Michael regrets showing off when Oscar asks for sponsorship for a charity walk being undertaken by his nephew, who has cerebral palsy.
GuestStars: David Denman, Craig Robinson, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, Kate Flannery, Leslie David Baker, Oscar Nu√±ez, Paul Lieberstein, Phyllis Smith
